summary: WHILE DRIVING 2 IGNITION COILS FAILED ON TWO SEPARATE OCCASIONS WHICH CAUSED THE VEHICLE TO STALL.  THE FIRST FAILURE WAS ON 11/30/02 AT 9500 MILES AND THE SECOND FAILURE WAS ON 01/18/03 AT 11000 MILES.  THE MANUFACTURER ADVISED THAT THEY WILL ONLY REPLACE DEFECTIVE COILS WHEN THEY FAIL.    *NLM
